alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; De Kalb; DuPage; Kane; Kendall; La Salle; Lee; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 11:37AM CST until January 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and early Tuesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a couple waves of freezing rain. The freezing rain is likely to stop, or even transition to a period of freezing drizzle this afternoon. However, more impactful freezing rain is expected tonight into Tuesday morning. Winds are expected to be light during the period of freezing rain overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
